mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (mypage_id, title, contents, reg_date, rating) SELECT m.id, #{title}, CONCAT('사용자 ', u.name, '의 리뷰: ', #{contents}), #{regDate}, #{rating} FROM user u JOIN mypage m ON u.id = m.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
